edu.ucla.sspace.evaluation
Interface WordSimilarityEvaluation

All Known Implementing Classes:
FinkelsteinEtAl353WordSimilarityEvaluation, RubensteinGoodenoughWordSimilarityEvaluation
public interface WordSimilarityEvaluation

An evaluation metric that compares the human-judged similarity of word pairs against the similarity judgements from a SemanticSpace.

Author:
David Jurgens

getPairs

Returns a collection of human similarity judgements for word pairs.

getMostSimilarValue

double getMostSimilarValue()
Returns the numeric similarity judgement that is equivalent to two words being completely similar (i.e. identical).

getLeastSimilarValue

double getLeastSimilarValue()
Returns the numeric similarity judgement that is equivalent to two words being completely dissimilar (i.e. identical).
